text: Revolut has a new promo  10% cashback (max $10) if you use it with gpay/apple pay 10x.Does public transport count or is it excluded?
Anyone knows if using Atome is considered online payments for UOB EVOL?
Hi anyone got referral code for xnap
XNAP doesn't have a referral program

Atome (MCC 5999) isn't excluded from UOB EVOL from what i understand of it's TnCs  but there were reports of pressing the pay now button early to trigger it as online  not sure how true since i don't audit my points that much (using HSBC Revolution for it)
Should qualify  be warned of mastercard posting routine however
https://www.revolut.com/en-SG/legal/applepay-googlepay-cashback-promotion/FYI this is the Revolut promo that was brought out thanks to Lucy(Only for June)
VISA posts public transport daily  Mastercard takes a few days (or even over a week) before public transports are "grouped" and posted as a single transaction to the card

Hi  can I check my new uob one account.My pay will only credit in to the bank on around 5th July. Will I get the cash rebate in July? Or will only get in August? Iâ€™m using uob evol card to clock $600 for this month.
will get interest for jul balance if u fulfilled the min $500 card spend in jul. Interest to be credited in 2 Aug.
Criteria fulfilment - All follow calendar month (based on when transactions are posted)Increased interest - credited for criteria fulfilment in last month.
Is your UOB Evol statement month same as UOB one account calendar month? If it is not  you may need to track manually if your Evol qualified spend is at least $600 on calendar month.
